title: Ollydbg Plugin Development
content: I wanted to write a simple Ollydbg plugin that shows me, for example, a simple message like hello world. in further, I wanted to learn how can I write a complex plugin to hook a function and to modify its parameters and so on. Is there any manual for that job?

comments.text: Did you try the manual that comes with OllyDbg?
No, where can I find it?
